pages.services: Services - Wildlife-Haven Online Zoo Wildlife-Haven Home Services Animals Contacts Services Home / Services Our services 30$Basic 1 Adult 1 Child Junglre Trail Toy Train Lake Purchase Now 40$Advanced 2 Adult 2 Child Junglre Trail Toy Train Lake Purchase Now 50$Pro 3 Adult 3 Child Junglre Trail Toy Train Lake Purchase Now The Best Zoo Experience A unique online format, "Wildlife Haven: Online Zoo" offers the opportunity to immerse yourself in the world of animals from the comfort of your own home. This innovative approach allows people from all over the world to enjoy the zoo, regardless of distance. A passion for animals: Zoo staff usually have a deep love and respect for animals. They strive to create a safe and nurturing environment for zoo residents. About our beautiful residentsThe zoo is home to many beautiful and amazing animals that impress with their beauty, grace and uniqueness 1 Research expeditions Organizing guided tours of the zoo's territory to study nature, vegetation and inhabitants, as well as to discuss environmental problems and ways of solving them. 2 Interactive lectures about animals Organization of fascinating lectures about different animal species, their behavior, features and protection. This will allow visitors to deepen their knowledge of the animal world and become more informed. 3 Training Master Classes Holding workshops on painting animals, creating crafts or making animal food. This activity will help visitors unlock their creativity and learn more about animals. 4 Photo shoots with animals Providing an opportunity for visitors to take unique photos with the animals under the supervision of professional photographers. This is not only a memorable experience, but also a great way to support the work of the zoo. 5 Participation in a feeding program Conducting special programs where visitors can observe and even participate in the feeding process of various animals. 6 Game events Organizing interactive games and quests to teach about animals, their behavior and natural environment. This is a fun and educational way to spend time at the zoo. Our wonderful staff Jacob I want to invite you to an exciting adventure at our zoo! You will be surprised by the kinds of animals we carefully keep here. Come to enjoy the beauty of nature and have a fun and exciting time. I look forward to seeing you! Aiden We have amazing things happening at the zoo, and I want to share them with you! I invite you to a tour of our enclosures, where you can see many amazing animals and learn interesting facts about them. Let's spend an unforgettable time together in the world of wildlife! Brandon Do you want to meet our unusual inhabitants? I invite you to an amazing walk through our zoo! Here you are waiting for exciting meetings with animals and a lot of interesting facts about them. It will be fun and educational! Come, you won't regret it! pages.index: Wildlife-Haven Online Zoo Wildlife-Haven Home Services Animals Contacts Welcome to Wildlife Haven: Online Zoo. your virtual oasis of wildlife! Immerse yourself in an exciting world of online broadcasts, interactive events and educational resources. Learn more about our residents, join virtual field trips, and help scientists with social research. "Wildlife Haven: Online Zoo is an opportunity to explore, learn and be inspired from the comfort of your own home. Ream more The Best Zoo Experience A unique online format, "Wildlife Haven: Online Zoo" offers the opportunity to immerse yourself in the world of animals from the comfort of your own home. This innovative approach allows people from all over the world to enjoy the zoo, regardless of distance. A passion for animals: Zoo staff usually have a deep love and respect for animals. They strive to create a safe and nurturing environment for zoo residents. About our beautiful residentsThe zoo is home to many beautiful and amazing animals that impress with their beauty, grace and uniqueness 2000+Animal Varieties 300+Food & Drink 100+Daily Customers 15Locations Available A little bit of our history In the 1950s, a small town near a mountain range had the idea for a zoo. It was the idea of a local biology teacher, Mr. Johnson, who had always dreamed of giving his students the opportunity to see a variety of wildlife in person. He began his work to create the zoo with a small group of like-minded locals who were in love with nature. Together they started collecting donations, looking for a suitable location for the zoo and building the first enclosures. The first years of work were not easy. There was a lack of funding, and many thought the project was too ambitious for such a small town. But Mr. Johnson and his team didn't give up. They organized fairs, charity events and local festivals to raise money and awareness for their project. Over time, the zoo began to take shape. It became home to a variety of animals, from small birds and exotic fish to large predators and ungulates. The zoo created a comfortable environment for the animals that made them feel at home. Over time, the zoo became not only a place of entertainment for locals and tourists, but also a center for education and scientific research. Many scientists and students came here to study animal behavior and contribute to the preservation of natural diversity. Today, the zoo founded by Mr. Johnson and his team continues to thrive. It remains a popular place to visit where everyone can see the beauty and diversity of wildlife and have a unique experience with the animals. This zoo has become not only a place of entertainment, but also a symbol of dreams and perseverance that can lead to the creation of something beautiful and unforgettable. pages.privacy-policy: Policy-Privacy - Wildlife-Haven Online Zoo Wildlife-Haven Home Services Animals Contacts Privacy-Policy 1. Welcome to Wildlife-Haven Online Zoo, we value your trust and are committed to protecting your privacy. This document describes how we collect, use and protect your personal information. 2. We only collect personal information that you provide to us voluntarily when you use our site, such as your email address to subscribe to newsletters or data provided when placing an order for tickets. 3. The personal information you provide is used only to process your inquiries and to provide your convenience when visiting our site. We do not sell, rent or share your information with third parties without your consent. 4. We take all measures necessary to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use or disclosure. 5. We may use cookies to improve your experience on our website and to collect anonymous statistics about its use. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, however this may affect the functionality of the site. 6. Our site may contain links to third-party websites or services that have their own privacy policies. We are not responsible for the content or actions of these parties. 7. We do not collect information about children under the age of 13 without the consent of their parents or guardians. > 8. We reserve the right to update this privacy policy as necessary. Any changes will be posted on this page. 9. By using our website, you agree to the terms of our privacy policy. 10. If you have any questions or suggestions regarding our privacy policy, please contact us at Wildlife-Haven@gmail.com 11. You can request access to your personal data that we hold and make changes where necessary. 12. We may store and process your personal information on servers located outside of your country. In doing so, we will ensure that we comply with all applicable data protection laws. 13. We only keep your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected. 14. We may use third-party advertising networks to serve ads on our site. These companies may use information about your visits to this and other websites to provide relevant advertising about products and services. 15. By using our website and providing us with your personal data, you give us your consent to process it in accordance with this privacy policy. 16. We may from time to time send you notices of changes to our privacy policy by email or post an updated version of our privacy policy on our website. 17. You may unsubscribe from our mailing list by following the instructions at the end of each email or by contacting us at Wildlife-Haven@gmail.com 18. We use data encryption to protect your personal information when transmitted over the Internet to prevent unauthorized access to your personal information. 19. We may work with partners and sponsors to provide services and content on our site. All such companies are bound by our privacy standards. 20. If you have any questions, suggestions or concerns regarding our privacy policy or data processing, please contact us at Wildlife-Haven@gmail.com Home Services Animals Contacts Privacy policy Terms and conditions © 2024 Wildlife-Haven Online Zoo. All rights reserved.
